alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 10:55AM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following area, Logan. * WHEN...Until 100 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 954 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Russellville, Anderson, Auburn, Adairville, Lewisburg, Danby, Cooperstown, Epleys, Cave Springs and Dennis. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
